item.title: Conventional Commits and Generating Changelogs
item.description: Documentation, while in many cases important, might not be the first thing you as a developer want to spend time on doing. Something you might do like as a developer is to spend a lot of time automating simple but tedious tasks in order to never have to do it manually again! With documentation being a particularly important part in our project we were extra keen on finding as many ways of automating documentation as possible.
